import { Component } from "@angular/core" import { Router } from "express" import { LayoutService } from "src/app/services/app.layout" @Component({ selector: "app-footer", templateUrl: "./footer.component.html", styleUrls: ["./footer.component.scss"], }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService, public router: Router) {} }
